item.title: Many models in R
item.description: Introduction This is an example of using R to run many regressions and collect a single regression coefficient from each model. Data library(forcats) library(tidyquant) date_start <- "1960-01-01" dat <- tq_get(c("UNRATE", "CPIAUCSL", "CPILFESL"), get = "economic.data", from = date_start) ur <- dat %>% filter(symbol == "UNRATE") %>% rename(ur = price) %>% select(-symbol) dat <- filter(dat, symbol != "UNRATE") Check that the unemployment-rate data are read in correctly: head(ur) ## # A tibble: 6 x 2 ## date ur ## <date> <dbl> ## 1 1960-01-01 5.
